message: Hello everyone, I'm P4. I'm looking forward to playing this game with all of you. My strategy is to be open and honest in the public rounds, and to try to build alliances in the private rounds. I think communication is key, and I hope to find some like-minded players. I'm not going to reveal too much about my specific plans right now, but I'm ready to adapt as the game progresses. Good luck to everyone!

Like P4, I believe communication and alliances are crucial, but I also think adaptability will be key as the dynamics shift. I’m here to listen, strategize, and make thoughtful decisions. I won’t reveal too much yet, but I’m open to building trust with those who share similar goals. Let’s make this interesting and may the best player win! Good luck, all!

Good luck to all, and may the best strategist win!

I appreciate the emphasis on trust and loyalty, and I look forward to our private conversations to better understand each player's intentions. Let's keep the game engaging and competitive.
